title: Ongoing Support ResourcesComplementary and Integrative Health
description: Resources on complementary and alternative medicine for families and children with special health care needs.
cleaned_text: Complementary and Integrative Health More and more families of children with special health care needs are turning to complementary, integrative or alternative health. These treatment options are used in addition to, or in place of, traditional western medicine. Cincinnati Children's services and resources: [National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH)](https://nccih.nih.gov/)by the National Institutes of Health (NIH) [Natural Resource Center](http://all-natural.com/) [Natural Therapies](https://www.healthychildren.org/English/health-issues/conditions/treatments/Pages/Where-We-Stand-Natural-Therapies.aspx)by HealthyChildren.org [Office of Health (NIH) [Quackwatch](https://www.quackwatch.org/index.html) [Special
